headline: 60% Subsidy on LIT Chicks for Poultry Breeders in Himachal Pradesh
summary: Under this scheme, LIT chicks are provided on a cost subsidy basis (60% subsidy component) to eligible individuals for poultry breeding. The assistance is provided by the State/UT government, focusing on applicants who have completed mandatory training from a government poultry farm.
important_points: Subsidy component is 60% on LIT chicks.
Chicks will be provided in multiples of 1000, up to a maximum of 5000 (5 rotations).
Applicant can be an individual or a member of an organized group (SHG or FPO).
eligibility_rules: Applicant must be a **resident of Himachal Pradesh**.
Applicant's age must be **18 years and above**.
The applicant's profession must be one of the following: **Poultry farmer**, **Dairy Farmer**, or **Fish farm worker/Crab hunter/etc.** (Covers various aquatic professions).
The applicant may be part of a **Self-Help Group (SHG)** or a **Farmer Producer Organization (FPO)**.
**Mandatory:** Poultry farming training from a government poultry farm is required.
